resources.string:
‣ My name is Omar, affectionately known as Jeremy. 

‣ My favorite soccer team is Manchester United. 

‣ My favorite football team is the New York Giants. 

‣ Gaming is my all time favorite hobby. 

‣ I like making apps that solve everyday problems. 

‣ My all-time favorite tv show is Strike Back. Why? Because it is AWESOME! Also, what a huge let down Game of Thrones turned out to be.
